      • mayEdit

        public boolean mayEdit(User user)
        Checks whether the user with the given ID is allowed to edit this comment (i.e. the annotation belongs to this (proper) user.
        Parameters:
        user - a User object.
        Returns:
        true if allowed; false otherwise
